segments.text: Look ! They're going to do the first drawing ! It's for a DVD player !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . That must be the DVD player that another one of my friends donated . He owns one of the largest electronics stores in Taipei !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're picking a name ... It's ... Darryl from marketing ! Rats !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry ! There are a lot more prizes ! I know , because the prizes are all from companies that I work with !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm ... Darryl doesn't look like the red underwear type ...
segments.speaker: S1
